name: Environment Variables Example

on: [push]

env:
  DB_NAME  : demo_db

jobs:
  test:
    env:
      DB_USER: test_user
      DB_PASSWORD: test_password

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Output informations
        run: |
          echo "${{ env.DB_NAME }}"
          echo "${{ env.DB_USER }}"
          echo "${{ env.DB_PASSWORD }}"
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Output informations
        run: |
          echo "${{ env.DB_NAME }}"
          echo "${{ env.DB_USER }}"
          echo "${{ env.DB_PASSWORD }}"
